text: On or before December 1, 2007, the Office of the Chief Tenant Advocate shall promulgate rules, subject to Council approval, to implement the provisions of this chapter.
historical:

Effective Dates

Section 5 of D.C. Law 16-181 provides: "Section 2 through 4 shall apply as of October 1, 2007."
